name: fibreboard production, soft, from wet processes | fibreboard, soft | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3549/documentation

140 kg/m3;This dataset has been revised. The input  'heat, district or industrial, other than natural gas' includes 1.47E2 MJ from light fuel oil. This is used as a proxy for heat from animal fat.;The old flows related to light fuel oil and carbon corrections have been deleted.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

includes all inputs to the production processes, transport, wastes and emissions to air and water; does not include any packaging material
